hero.title: Your world, always online
hero.description: Get started for free and create your personal Minecraft Bedrock Server. 5-minute setup. Guaranteed.

setup.title: Quick setup
setup.description: We will deploy your server within minutes of you creating it.

speed.title: Lightning fast
speed.description: Lag is an issue from the past with our top of the line server hardware.

panel.title: Easy panel
panel.description: Intuitive and simple for new server owners, and advanced options for experienced ones.

price.title: How much does a Minecraft Bedrock server cost?
price.description: Bedocker allows you to get started with your own Minecraft Bedrock server free of charge. There are no hidden fees or recurring payments necessary to get up and running. Sign up now & have your own personal server ready in 5 minutes.

features.title: What can I do with my server?
features.description: Your server is fully customizable â€” that means you can change any settings you want to change. That includes the maximum players, the gamemode, seed, whitelist etc.

uptime.title: Does my server stay online?
uptime.description: To spare resources (memory and cores), inactive servers are stopped after six hours. We don't have a queue, so once you want to play again, it takes less than a minute to start it back up again.

players.title: How many people can play on my server?
players.description: The limit of how many people can join your server is up to you. A server generally runs performantly with 5-10 players online at once.

cta.title: Let's get you onboard
cta.description: Our service will get your own Minecraft Bedrock server up and running in less than 5 minutes. If you don't like it, you can stop your server and close your account at any time.

switch.title: I agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

feedback.duplicate: Account with this email already exists.
feedback.ratelimited: Too many requests, please try again later.

setup.title: Setup
setup.description: Welcome to Bedocker! These default options will work for most people. Look through them and change them to your needs, and once you're done, click set up.

levelType.title: Level (world) type
levelType.note: Requires world regeneration to go into effect

playerIdleTimeout.title: Player idle timeout
playerIdleTimeout.note: Number of minutes a player can be inactive before being kicked; 0 = disabled

note.settings: Requires world regeneration to go into effect; leave empty for random seed

onlineMode.title: Online mode
onlineMode.note: While disabling this option allows you to play on your server without having a Minecraft/Mojang account, it exposes your server to threats, such as users bypassing your whitelist.

newPassword.title: New password
newPassword.note: Optional; only specify this if you want to change your password

status.hibernating: Online (<svg width="24" height="24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z"/><path d="M11 11v2l-5.327 6H11v2H3v-2l5.326-6H3v-2h8zm10-8v2l-5.327 6H21v2h-8v-2l5.326-6H13V3h8z"/></svg>)

settings.note: A restart is necessary for most changes to go into effect.

feedback.format: Invalid world (invalid or unsupported zip format)
feedback.specialCharacters: Invalid world (level name must not consist of only special characters)

note.irreversible: This is irreversible and will overwrite your world!
note.inventory: If you are importing a singleplayer world, your inventory won't be transfered. Put your belongings into a container to keep them.

404.description:
The page you were looking for could not be found. It might have been removed, renamed, or did not exist in the first place.

Keep on digging!
